question: In most developed countries shopping is not only about buying the goods you need, it is also perceived as entertainment. Is it a positive or negative development? Give your own opinion and examples based on your experience.

In my opinion, that behaviour they gain form advertisements and influencers, and I am of the belief that  this a negative development on society. I will discuss that below in this essay.

Firstly, the drawbacks on individuals who work all month to get the salary and go shopping to buy gadgets they do not really need to put these employees under pressure  most of the time. For instance, in the Arabic Gulf, many inhabitants save money every month to buy an expensive brand of clothes they not need. Secondly, the demerits on the environment and society impact on air pollution come from the production process because the high order of customers leed to increase of the producting and increase the pollution. Thus, If the community searching for good behaviour for people and the environment should publish awareness advertisements for those people.
